```
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    metadata:
      name: kubeserve 
      labels:
        app: kubeserve 
    spec:
      replicas : 3
      selector:
        matchLabels:
          app: kubeserve 
      template:
        metadata:
          labels:
            app: kubeserve 
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: nginx
            image: nginx
            ports:
            - containerPort: 80
    ```
